name: Henrique Pereira
bio: Admires everything that respects its user's freedom - that's why his emacs journey started. One of his purposes is to bring libre software more approachable to everyone. Free as in free speech not as in free beer!

name: Filipe Felício
bio: Started programming five years ago. Used to spend all day writing code in CeSIUM, still do from time to time. Elixir enthusiast, working @ Marmelasoft. Proud owner of a |> tattoo.

name: Matilde Bravo
bio: Has a strong passion for everything Linux-related. Spends most of her time on the command line and doesn't like GUI's very much. If not on the computer, she's probably singing and playing with TMUM.

name: Rui Lopes
bio: Started programming four years ago and since then never stopped. Loves Python and is starting to love Elixir too. Joined CeSIUM to develop a lot more skills and meet new people. Aiming to install Arch Linux for the 15th time last week.
